phrases.defaultPageDescription: Global Biodiversity Information Facility. Free and Open Access to Biodiversity Data.
phrases.largeFileUploadWarning: Be aware that large files can take a long time to upload
phrases.errorNotAuthorized: Looks like you aren't authorized to view this page
phrases.criticalErrorMsg: The system is currently not able to process your request. Try to refresh the page and please report the issue if it continues.
phrases.nonCriticalErrorMsg: Not all data is currently available. You are seeing a partial view of the data. Try to refresh the page and please report the issue if it continues.
phrases.noResultsMessage: No results – try to loosen your filters
phrases.dontSeeYourIpt: Don't see your IPT? Send [GBIF](mailto:helpdesk@gbif.org "Mail to GBIF Helpdesk requesting IPT be added to map") your coordinates.
phrases.faqDescription: These are some of the most frequently asked questions about GBIF and GBIF.org. Please contact us if your questions aren’t answered here.
phrases.noJavascriptEnabled: We’re sorry, but GBIF doesn’t work properly without JavaScript enabled.
phrases.isSplashScreen: Our website has detected that you are using an outdated insecure browser that will prevent you from using the site. We suggest you upgrade to a modern browser.
